title: Drawing, "Personification of Two of the Elements", 1800–23
medium: pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash over black chalk with traces of graphite
inscribed: "3 aqua," "4 terra." Inscription in black chalk.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Horizontal rectangle. Above: Water Amphitrite riding over water. Caption: "3 aqua". Below: Cybele in chariot drawn by lions, upon which putti with torches sit. Caption: "4 terra."

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Personification of Two of the Elements", 1800–23.
1800–23. pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash over black chalk with traces of graphite. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-947.
